Marketing Officer Job at Premidis Nigeria Limited




        
    

        
        Premidis Nigeria Limited is a proudly Nigerian manufacturing and distribution company dedicated to producing premium wines, beverages, and cosmetic products that meet both local and international quality standards.

Incorporated under the Companies and Allied Matters Act of the Federal Republic of Nigeria, Premidis Nigeria Limited operates with a clear vision to become a leading name in the organic and natural products industry, combining innovation, quality, and sustainability across all our product lines.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Marketing Officer

Job Locations: Lagos and Ogun
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	We are looking for an innovative and target-driven Marketing Officer to plan and execute marketing strategies that increase product visibility, boost sales, and strengthen the company’s market position.
	The ideal candidate should be creative, analytical, and experienced in the Fast-Moving Consumer Goods (FMCG).


Key Responsibilities


	Develop and implement marketing and promotional strategies for all company products.
	Conduct market research to identify consumer preferences, trends, and competition.
	Manage product branding, advertising, and social media marketing campaigns.
	Organize and participate in trade fairs, exhibitions, and marketing events.
	Build and maintain relationships with distributors, retailers, and partners.
	Work closely with the sales team to meet business goals and improve product distribution.
	Prepare and submit weekly and monthly marketing reports to management.


Requirements


	Minimum of HND or B.Sc. in Marketing, Business Administration, or a related field.
	Minimum of 2–3 years of relevant experience in marketing or sales (FMCG or cosmetics industry preferred).
	Excellent communication, negotiation, and interpersonal skills.
	Strong knowledge of digital marketing and social media promotion.
	Must be able to work independently and handle field assignments.
	Must reside in Lagos or Ogun State.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and cover letter to: premidisnigerialimited@gmail.com using "Application for Marketing Officer Position" as the subject of the mail.

Note: Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted for an interview.

title: Content Creator Job at Kiyix Recruitment Hub
content:
KIYIX is a recruitment/HR consulting firm, and our goal is to help create one million jobs in Nigeria by 2030. At Kiyix recruitment hub, we help make recruitment a stress-free experience for both the employer and the potential job seekers.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Content Creator

Job Location: Isolo, Lagos 
Employment Type: Full-time
Industry: Pharmaceutical
Job Type: Open for Negotiations

Job Summary
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	As a Content Creator, you will be responsible for developing, engaging high-quality content for our digital platforms, including social media, website, and marketing campaigns.
	You will work closely with our marketing team to create content that resonates with our audience and supports our brand objectives.


Key Responsibilities


	Develop compelling content (written, visual, and video) for social media, website, and marketing materials
	Conduct research to stay up-to-date with industry trends and best practices
	Collaborate with the marketing team to align content with brand strategy and campaigns
	Manage and maintain our social media presence, ensuring consistent branding and messaging
	Create engaging stories and narratives that drive audience engagement and brand awareness
	Optimize content for SEO and digital platforms
	Analyze content performance and adjust strategies accordingly


Requirements


	2-5 years of experience in content creation, copywriting, or a related field
	Proven portfolio of work showcasing writing, editing, and content creation skills
	Excellent writing, editing, and communication skills
	Strong understanding of social media platforms and digital marketing trends
	Ability to work independently and as part of a team
	Creativity, innovation, and attention to detail
	Proficiency in content management systems and digital tools (e.g., Canva, Adobe Creative Suite)


Nice to Have:


	Experience in the healthcare or pharmaceutical industry
	Knowledge of SEO principles and content optimization
	Video production and editing skills


Salary
N150,000 - N200,000 / month.

What We Offer:


	Competitive salary and benefits package
	Opportunities for career growth and professional development
	Collaborative and dynamic work environment
	Creative freedom to develop innovative content.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their Resume, Portfolio, and Cover letter to: kicvacancy@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

Note: For more enquires send WhatsApp message to 09063916949.    

    

        Click here to Apply
